portfolio.title: Social Network
portfolio.overview: A React Redux based single page application. Users can interact with other users.

features.feature-text: Users can sign up. Their data is stored in a PostgreSQL Database. Their password is salted, hashed and encrpypted.
Users who already signed up previously can quickly log in
Users who forgot their password can reset it. A code is being sent to their email, if they verify using the code, they can enter a new password.
Users can upload and edit information about themselves such as their name, a profile picture and a bio. The profile picture is uploaded to AWS S3, a reference gets stored in the Database.
Users can search for other users by name or browse a selection of users who recently joined.

Users can send friend requests to other users. They have the option to cancel a friend request. Pending friend requests can be either answered by accepting or deleting them. Existing friendships can be ended. Users who are friends, can view each others friends list.
Users can enter a site wide live chat and message other users. This is accomplished by using web sockets with socket.io
Protected from csurf type attacks and SQL injections
Browser remembers logged in / logged out state

portfolio.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, Express, PostgreSQL, Redis, Jest, Babel, Webpack, React, Redux, AWS SDK, AWS S3, AWS SES, Axios, Socket.io, Multer, Bcrypt, Cookie Session, Csurf, Git, GitHub

portfolio.title: Connect Four
portfolio.overview: Classic Connect Four: Two players take turns putting pieces on the board, the first player to achieve a row of horizontal, vertical or diagonal pieces wins. Play with the mouse, or press left/right arrows and enter to play with the keyboard. Activate the dark mode by pressing 'n' on the keyboard.
